channel.name: Classica IT
channel.title: Bach - Passione secondo Giovanni
channel.desc: Composizione sacra, BWV 245, \(1724\) - con Helen Donath, Julia Hamari, Peter Schreier, Horst Laubenthal, Ernst Gerold Schramm, Siegmund NimsGern - Muenchner Bachchor e Bachorchester - Karl Richter, dir. \(Ammersee, 1970\).
